titles: The petition of divers of the inhabitants of the citie of London, delivered at their severall courts of ward-moot, to the right worshipfull the aldermen and common-councell of the severall wards of London, the 22 of Deecember [sic], 1645
publisher: Printed for Henry Shepheard ... and William Ley ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries (London, England).
